testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid phone number
testcase.system-out: Given user on Home Page.....................................................passed And user goes to account select login.......................................passed When login page is opened user enters invalid phone number..................passed And click generate OTP button...............................................passed Then user should see an error message.......................................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with valid phone number but incorrect OTP
testcase.system-out: Given user on Home Page.....................................................passed And user goes to account select login.......................................passed When login page is opened user enters a valid phone number..................passed And click Send OTP button...................................................passed And user enters incorrect OTP...............................................passed And click verify button.....................................................passed Then user should see error message..........................................passed

testcase.name: Successful login with valid phone number
testcase.system-out: Given user on Home Page.....................................................passed And user goes to account select login.......................................passed When login page is opened user enters a valid phone number..................passed And click Send OTP button...................................................passed Then user should receive OTP via SMS........................................passed And user enters OTP.........................................................passed And click verify OTP button.................................................passed Then user should successfully logged into app...............................passed

testcase.name: View user Ticket
testcase.system-out: Given user on Home Page.....................................................passed And user goes to account select show my ticket..............................passed When user enters ticket number and mobile number............................passed Then trip details displays..................................................passed

testcase.name: User get Email or SMS
testcase.system-out: Given user on Home Page.....................................................passed When user goes to account select Email or SMS...............................passed Then user enters details to get Email or SMS................................passed
